headline: Scaling its Investment Platform in Minimally Invasive Care, Intuitive Ventures Appoints Terri Burke as Senior Partner and Ross Jaffe as Venture Advisor
summary: SUNNYVALE, Calif. - Intuitive Ventures today announced the appointment of Terri Burke, former head medtech investments at Epidarex Capital and a seasoned operator, as Senior Partner and Dr. Ross...
